title: Anat Avshalom Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Anat Avshalom? Check out all of Anat Avshalom's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogAnat Avshalom Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb Anat Avshalom Anat is a Senior Product Marketing Manager for Similarweb Shopper Intelligence. With 10+ years of experience in marketing and research, Anat is passionate about creating data-driven products for eCommerce professionals and using market insights to drive business impact. Anat is based in Tel Aviv and enjoys exploring Israel’s beaches, baking, and practicing Yoga.
